thread.title: Saints LB blocks and recovers punt for thrilling TD vs. Falcons
thread.title_full: Saints LB blocks and recovers punt for thrilling TD vs. Falcons

author: Micah Peters
title: Saints LB blocks and recovers punt for thrilling TD vs. Falcons
text:
Saints LB blocks and recovers punt for thrilling TD vs. Falcons USA Today Sports 7 hrs ago Micah Peters Following a dismal 1-4 start to the season, the New Orleans Saints came out firing on all cylinders against the Atlanta Falcons, hoping to right the ship after an embarrassing 39-17 loss to the Philadelphia Eagles in Week 5. They drove 80 yards to a two-yard punch-in from Mark Ingram for an early touchdown – the first time the Saints have done that on their first offensive possession this season.
AdChoices Then, with two minutes remaining in the first quarter, linebacker Michael Mauti barreled through the line and blocked a punt, recovering it in the end zone for another touchdown.
Block punt.Scoop.Score.14-0. #ATLvsNO http://t.co/ikSgsyYqB4
— #ATLvsNO (@nflnetwork) October 16, 2015
It wasn’t the same (because nothing can or ever will compare), but it definitely gave off eerie Steve Gleason 2006 vibes.
WOW!That HAD to make Steve Gleason proud. pic.twitter.com/aqfX6oRL0i
— CBS Sports (@CBSSports) October 16, 2015
